body_html: @Hui-Zhi you can set the environment variable CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES to set which GPUs are available for tensorflow to use. For example if you set CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1 in your environment before you run your code, only two GPUs will be used by TF.
body_text: @Hui-Zhi you can set the environment variable CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES to set which GPUs are available for tensorflow to use. For example if you set CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1 in your environment before you run your code, only two GPUs will be used by TF.
body: @Hui-Zhi you can set the environment variable `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES` to set which GPUs are available for tensorflow to use. For example if you set `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1` in your environment before you run your code, only two GPUs will be used by TF.
